question: What is the customer's obligation while using an AWS managed service under the AWS shared responsibility model?
options: Physical security of the data centers

question: All AWS users have access to which AWS Trusted Advisor check?
Which of the following is an example of security in the AWS Cloud under the AWS shared responsibility model?
Permissions for which of the following are managed by service control policies (SCPs)?
According to the AWS shared responsibility model, which job is shared between AWS and the customer?
Which duty is the customer's responsibility while administering AWS Lambda functions under the AWS shared responsibility model?
options: Scaling Lambda resources according to demand

question: Which of the following is a duty of the client under the AWS shared responsibility model? (Select two.)
options: Patch management of an Amazon RDS instance operating system
Controlling physical access to data centers
Patch management of an Amazon EC2 instance operating system
correct_answers: Patch management of an Amazon EC2 instance operating system

question: What attributes of an AWS account can AWS Trusted Advisor monitor and advise on? (Select two.)
How should an Amazon EC2 instance be granted access to an Amazon S3 bucket in accordance with security best practices?
options: Hard code an IAM user's secret key and access key directly in the application, and upload the file.
Store the IAM user's secret key and access key in a text file on the EC2 instance, read the keys, then upload the file.
Have the EC2 instance assume a role to obtain the privileges to upload the file.
Modify the S3 bucket policy so that any service can upload to it at any time.
correct_answers: Have the EC2 instance assume a role to obtain the privileges to upload the file.

question: Which of the following is included in the AWS Trusted Advisor checks? (Select two.)
options: Information on Amazon S3 bucket permissions
Multi-factor authentication enabled on the AWS account root user
Number of users in the account
correct_answers: Information on Amazon S3 bucket permissions
Multi-factor authentication enabled on the AWS account root user

question: Which scenarios should a user report to the AWS Abuse team? (Select two.)
options: A DDoS attack is being made on an AWS resource.
A SQL injection attack is being made from an IP address that is not an AWS address.
AWS resources are being used to host objectionable or illegal content.
A company's resources are being used in a way that is inconsistent with corporate policy.
A company is receiving HTTPS requests on a web server that is serving HTTP.
correct_answers: A DDoS attack is being made on an AWS resource.
AWS resources are being used to host objectionable or illegal content.

question: According to the AWS shared responsibility model, which of the following is the customer's obligation?
Which of the following is the customer's obligation under the shared responsibility model?
options: Ensuring that disk drives are wiped after use.
Ensuring that firmware is updated on hardware devices.
Ensuring that data is encrypted at rest.
Ensuring that network cables are category six or higher.
correct_answers: Ensuring that data is encrypted at rest.

question: Which action, in terms of AWS Cloud architecture, is compatible with the concept of least privilege?
options: Allow users the minimum access that is needed to do a task.
Prevent managers from accessing important source code.
Provide only the permissions that are needed for users to do their jobs in the current month.
Assign permissions that are based on job titles.
correct_answers: Allow users the minimum access that is needed to do a task.

question: Which of the following are customer duties under the AWS shared responsibility model? (Select two.)
options: Setting up server-side encryption on an Amazon S3 bucket
Physical security of data center facilities
correct_answers: Setting up server-side encryption on an Amazon S3 bucket

question: Which of the following tasks is the AWS customer's duty under the shared responsibility model? (Select two.)
options: Ensuring that application data is encrypted at rest
Ensuring that AWS NTP servers are set to the correct time
Ensuring that users have received security training in the use of AWS services
Ensuring that access to data centers is restricted
Ensuring that hardware is disposed of properly
correct_answers: Ensuring that application data is encrypted at rest
Ensuring that users have received security training in the use of AWS services

question:
Before transferring an environment to the AWS Cloud, a cloud practitioner must receive AWS compliance reports.

How are these reports produced?
options: Download the reports from AWS Artifact
Open a case with AWS Support
Generate the reports with Amazon Macie
correct_answers: Download the reports from AWS Artifact

question: What may be associated to an Amazon EC2 instance through AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) to initiate service requests?
Which of the following actions is the customer's responsibility under the AWS shared responsibility model? (Select two.)
options: Patching operating system components for Amazon Relational Database Server (Amazon RDS)
Maintaining environmental controls within a data center

question: Which of the following is a duty of AWS under the AWS shared responsibility model?
options: Enabling server-side encryption for objects stored in S3
Patching the operating system on an Amazon EC2 instance
